text: A performance of the play in 1916. The Lady from Trévelez (Spanish:La señorita de Trevélez) is a play by the Spanish writer Carlos Arniches which was first performed in 1916.Labanyi & Pavlović p.154 ==Film adaptations== * In 1935 Edgar Neville directed The Lady from Trévelez * In 1956 Juan Antonio Bardem directed Calle Mayor * There have also been several television version ==References== ==Bibliography== * Labanyi, Jo & Pavlović, Tatjana. A Companion to Spanish Cinema. John Wiley & Sons, 2012. Category:1916 plays Category:Spanish plays adapted into films Category:Plays set in Spain
title: The Lady from Trévelez (play)
